subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Boris Diaw scored 16 points, Tiago Splitter had 15 points and Tony Parker added 15 points to help the Spurs win their fourth straight over the still-winless Washington Wizards on Monday night.
snippet: Boris Diaw scored 16 points, Tiago Splitter had 15 points and Tony Parker added 15 points to help the Spurs win their fourth straight over the still-winless Washington Wizards on Monday night.
